violations.message: FAIL: Line 25: Exception → Logger Fallback (import suppression + fallback silently downgrades from loguru to standard logging); Line 134: Subprocess Exit Code Ignored via Exception Handling (subprocess.run with check=True but entire function lacks outer try/except - CalledProcessError caught at line 137 only logs and re-raises within this function, but caller has no guarantee of handling); Line 147: OSError Suppression (OSError caught line 145 only logs warning, marker write failure ignored); Line 73: Function Returns None Without `| None` in Signature (find_profile_requirements returns None on line 82 but signature line 68 shows `-> Path | None` - ALLOWED); Line 95: RuntimeError Suppression (RuntimeError caught line 98 only returns None, silently masks orchestrator root detection failure - VIOLATION of "Orchestrator Root Not Found → Fallback")
